item.title: Debian Server Optimize
item.description: Overview Debian OS as a server can be optimized in a lot of places, to list some important ones: Change TCP congestion control to use BBR or others, to improve network connectivity and bandwidth Enlarge file limit This applies to other Linux distribution also.

item.title: Setup Local DNS Server
item.description: Overview This tutorial is about how to get clean, optimized DNS resolve results by set up a local DNS server. Use China as an example.

item.title: Setup naiveproxy
item.description: Overview This tutorial is about how to set up naiveproxy server and client to provide transparent proxy to a local network.

item.title: SSL Certificate
item.description: Let’s Encrypt Let’s Encrypt provide free SSL certificate: They even support wildcard certificate! Certificate valid for 90 days. You could obtain or renew certificates automatically or manually.
